column1: #text=I usually get a haircut every few months to maintain .
#text=I choose a day where I have time to relax and will reserve an appointment at my favorite salon and with my favorite stylist to get my haircut .
#text=I arrive at my salon and was greeted nicely .
#text=I hang my jacket in their closet .
#text=I start my getting a hair wash .
#text=I sit and relax as they massage and wash my hair with very fragrant shampoos and conditioners .
#text=After the hair wash I go sit in the chair of my favorite stylist .
#text=He greets me with a smile and asks me what kind of haircut would I like this time and I had said just a trim .
#text=He blows my hair dry first and cuts my hair nicely as always and then ends it by styling it with some hair product .
#text=I pay the cashier and tip my stylist well .
#text=I leave the salon with nice salon hair .
